title: [COSPLAY] Armageddon Auckland 2014
body:
Hey summoners,

We've been lucky enough to travel around to a few events in Oceania in the last month, and along the way we've met some amazing cosplayers. These guys have poured blood, sweat, and tears into putting together a costume for their favourite champion, and I know I've been blown away by some of the things they've come up with! Armageddon Auckland in particular featured some really cool twists on champion designs - and just some really chilled summoners in general. 

Check out some of our photos from Armageddon [[here]](https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.455996361208459.1073741850.243324295809001&type=3).

replies.body: It was awesome visiting Auckland again!
lol the rioters have their little chat...
